content:
The v3.ActUSPrivacyLaw valueset contains all deprecated codes. See http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/v3/ActUSPrivacyLaw/vs.html
The codeSystem guidance states content is moved to ActCode under _ActPrivacyLaw; use that instead.
Just want to confirm that -

  1. the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActUSPrivacyLaw system should not be used?
  2. Use http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode code system instead?
  3. If using http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode code system, is there a way to constrain it to just the ActPrivacyLaw?

Please note that the valueset using this code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActUSPrivacyLaw is used by consent, documentReference, AuditEvent and Meta
